participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and focused, Emily is passionate about animal welfare and dedicated to her studies.
participant_1.background: I am going back to school. I love animals. I love country. I am a vegan. I enjoy reading.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Resilient and nurturing, Jessica balances her responsibilities as a mom and student while dreaming of a medical career.
participant_2.background: Until then I will make 215 an hour. I am a college student who is a full time working mom. I make and me by waiting tables. I cannot wait to start my new life. I hope it to become a doctor one day.

content.text: Hi! I'm going back to school to become a veterinarian.
Awesome! That's great to hear. I'm also a college student who is a full time working mom.
That must be tough. How do you do it?
It's not easy, but it's worth it. I'm working hard to provide a better life for my family.
That's really admirable. I'm sure you're a great mom.
Thank you. I try my best.
What are you studying in college?
I'm studying to be a nurse.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great nurse.
So, what are you looking forward to most about your new life?
I'm looking forward to starting my career and helping people.
That's awesome. I'm sure you'll do great things.
